medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was admitted with complaints of diarrhea, fever, and poor feeding leading to severe malnutrition manifested as marasmus. Prior treatments including rehydration and antibiotics did not improve symptoms. Symptoms improved significantly after hydroxocobalamin treatment.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient's mother had two previous pregnancies that resulted in spontaneous miscarriages. The pregnancy with the patient was unremarkable.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of associated diseases was reported, especially of the hematologic system.
